Membership – Golf
A Golf Membership in Bay Point Golf Club will offer you access to the only Nicklaus Designed course in NW Florida. It has won “Best of Bay” the last 8 years running!. The Club also boast a full service Club Shop, Golf Pros on staff and Bar 72 serving breakfast (Friday-Sunday), lunch daily and special event dinners every Thursday and lots of other special events throughout the year. Make it a family affair with our couples membership! We have an active Ladies and Men’s Group with regular Member Only Activities throughout the year. We also have very affordable membership options for those 25 years of age and younger!
A non-equity membership with Bay Point Golf Club makes it easy for you to enjoy playing golf all year long with…
Unlimited play for only a cart fee (trail fee available)
Member guest rates for family and friends
Advance tee time bookings
Unlimited driving range access
Discounts in the golf shop
For more information, stop in and talk to our golf professionals. We will be happy to discuss all the great benefits of becoming a member at Bay Point Golf Club!
You can also reach us by calling (850) 235-6950 or by E-mail: Head Golf Professional, Gavon Byrd, gbyrd@baypointgolfclub.com.
For 2025 Membership Information, see below:
BAY POINT_Membership Application 2025

Prepare yourself for an unparalleled golfing experience. Our Nicklaus Design Championship Course is a pleasure for golfers of all skill levels. Recognized for its premium conditioning and risk reward opportunities, our Nicklaus Course has everything needed to challenge you and improve your game!

Panama City Beach, FL 32408
